name: nchadoop hdfs://yournamenode:8020/
tagline: A commandline ncdu like file browser for Hadoop HDFS
body:
About
======

nchadoop is a *ncdu* like file browser for Hadoop to identify wasted disc space.

It scans folders on hdfs and procudes a cli like this:

![Screenshot](https://raw.github.com/d0x/nchadoop/gh-pages/images/screenshot.png)

Just download the tarball and start to browse your file system with:

    nchadoop hdfs://yournamenode:8020/
